mapper.select: SELECT E1.EQID AS equipment_id, E1.EQNAME AS equipment_name, E1.EQDESC AS equipment_description, E1.EQHANDLERCLASS AS equipment_handlerclass, E1.EQSTATE_TAGID AS equipment_statetagid, E1.EQALIVE_TAGID AS equipment_alivetagid, E1.EQALIVEINTERVAL AS equipment_aliveinterval, E1.EQCOMMFAULT_TAGID AS equipment_commfaulttagid, E1.EQADDRESS AS equipment_address, E1.EQ_PROCID AS equipment_procid, E1.EQSTATUSTIME AS equipment_status_time, E1.EQSTATUSDESC AS equipment_status_desc, E2.EQID AS subequipment_id, C.CMDID AS commandtag_id, E1.EQSTATE as equipment_state FROM EQUIPMENT E1 LEFT OUTER JOIN EQUIPMENT E2 ON E1.EQID = E2.EQ_PARENT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMANDTAG C ON E1.EQID = C.CMD_EQID WHERE E1.EQ_PROCID IS NOT NULL

SELECT E1.EQID AS equipment_id, E1.EQNAME AS equipment_name, E1.EQDESC AS equipment_description, E1.EQHANDLERCLASS AS equipment_handlerclass, E1.EQSTATE_TAGID AS equipment_statetagid, E1.EQALIVE_TAGID AS equipment_alivetagid, E1.EQALIVEINTERVAL AS equipment_aliveinterval, E1.EQCOMMFAULT_TAGID AS equipment_commfaulttagid, E1.EQSTATUSTIME AS equipment_status_time, E1.EQSTATUSDESC AS equipment_status_desc, E1.EQADDRESS AS equipment_address, E1.EQ_PROCID AS equipment_procid, E2.EQID AS subequipment_id, C.CMDID AS commandtag_id, E1.EQSTATE as equipment_state FROM EQUIPMENT E1 LEFT OUTER JOIN EQUIPMENT E2 ON E1.EQID = E2.EQ_PARENT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN DATATAG D ON (E1.EQID = D.TAG_EQID AND D.TAGRULE IS NULL AND D.TAGCONTROLTAG = 0) LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMANDTAG C ON E1.EQID = C.CMD_EQID WHERE E1.EQ_PROCID IS NOT NULL AND E1.EQID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EQUIPMENT (EQID, EQNAME, EQDESC, EQHANDLERCLASS, EQSTATE_TAGID, EQALIVE_TAGID, EQALIVEINTERVAL, EQCOMMFAULT_TAGID, EQADDRESS, EQ_PROCID, EQSTATE, EQSTATUSTIME, EQSTATUSDESC) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{handlerClassName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stateTagId}, #{aliveTagId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{aliveInterval}, #{commFaultTagId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processId}, #{supervisionStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: UPDATE EQUIPMENT SET EQNAME = #{name}, EQDESC = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EQHANDLERCLASS = #{handlerClassName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EQSTATE_TAGID = #{stateTagId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, EQALIVE_TAGID = #{aliveTagId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, EQALIVEINTERVAL = #{aliveInterval,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, EQCOMMFAULT_TAGID = #{commFaultTagId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, EQADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EQ_PROCID = #{processId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} WHERE EQID = #{id}
